channel.title: 0-GEE on Julian Tang
channel.description: Recent content in 0-GEE on Julian Tang

item.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
item.description: Relax, we didn’t actually go back in time to WWII. This was just a reenactment of the Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941. That Mitsubishi A6M Zero is real, though.

item.title: Titan Aerobatics Team 1
item.description: This shot actually goes pretty hard

item.title: Cutting the Ribbon
item.description: Ok can we talk about how crazy this is? Patty Wagstaff is 72 years old at the time of this photo and here she is cutting a ribbon with the tail of her Extra Flugzeugbau EA300 only a few metres above the ground, while INVERTED! Talk about an aviation girlboss! I’ve actually known about Wagstaff for over a decade now thanks to her being featured in the Microsoft Flight Simulator series.

item.title: Sun 'n Fun: An Avgeek's (Literal) Paradise
item.description: When people think of the state of Florida, they may think of hot and humid weather, lots of sunshine, theme parks, and cruise ships (oh, and the ever mythical Florida Man, of course). What most probably don’t associate with Florida is one of the largest aerospace expos on the North American continent. An expo so large, that it easily rivals the renowned EAA AirVenture Oshkosh expo held in Wisconsin. I’m talking, of course, about Sun ’n Fun.

item.title: First Post
item.description: So this is my very first blog post. To be honest I don’t really know what to write about for this post, so it’s going to be a short one. Also, I’m writing this prior to deploying this website, so if you’re reading this, it means I managed to avoid getting gapped by my deployment pipeline! Yippee! As I’ve said in my about section, this blog will pretty much be me spilling my thoughts onto the internet.
